text: 28:14 Jenesis 12:3; 22:18Eghtɨ nɨn ovavir boriba nguazir mɨnemniabar mɨn bar avɨrasemegham. Egh men nguazir, aruem anadi naghɨn ko, aruem uaghiri naghɨn ko, not ko, sautɨn itiba, me bar adagh isɨvagham. Eghtɨ nɨ ko nɨn ovavir boriba bangɨn, kɨ nguazimɨn itir kantribar gumazamiziba, bar deraghvɨra me damuam.
